name.en: Application for space optics instrument I

department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch: We introduce the Earth and planetary system science and lunar related mission and also discuss how the moon formed and moon exploration.
goal.en: We introduce the Earth and planetary system science and lunar related mission and also discuss how the moon formed and moon exploration.

outline.ch:
"課程部分：
簡介地球與行星科學 (Introduction to Earth and Planetary System Science)
 Introduction to Earth and Planetary System Science
 Components of the Earth System
 Material Circulation in the Earth
 Nature–Human Interaction
 The Universe and Solar System
 Evolution of the Earth System
月球的前世今生 (How the moon formed?)
月球任務 (Moon missions): Apollo mission, Lunar Prospector, LRO, etc.
如何到地球外採礦 (Extraterrestrial resources for human space missions)
 NASA In Situ Resource Utilization (ISRU)
 NASA Exploration System Architecture Study
 NASA Strategic Knowledge Gaps (SKG)
月球的光譜特徵 (The characteristics of spectrum on the lunar surface)
地球外也會發生閃電 (The studies of planetary atmospheric electricity)
如何殖民月球 (How to build habitats on the Moon?)
如何設計月球上的科學儀器 (How to design a scientific payload onboard Moon orbiter)"
